sourcesContent:
import { Box, Center, Heading, Image } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import React from "react";
import GitHubCalendar from "react-github-calendar";
const Github = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Center>
        <Box w="50%">
          <Heading pb={5}>Github Calender </Heading>
          <GitHubCalendar username="sp740881" />
        </Box>
      </Center>
      <Center>
        <Box   w="30%">
          <Heading pb={8}>Github Streak </Heading>
          <Image id="github-streak-stats" src="https://github-readme-streak-stats.herokuapp.com?user=sp740881&theme=vue&hide_border=true"></Image>
        </Box>
      </Center>
      <Center>
        <Box  w="20%">
          <Heading pb={8}>Github Language </Heading>
          <Image id="github-top-langs" src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=sp740881"></Image>
        </Box>
      </Center>
      <Center>
        <Box  w="30%">
          <Heading pb={8}>Github Stats </Heading>
          <Image id="github-stats-card"
            src="
https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=sp740881&show_icons=true&theme=vue&hide_border=true"
          ></Image>
        </Box>
      </Center>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Github;
